verses.name: Luke 6:26
verses.text: Woe unto you, when all men shall speak well of you! for so did their fathers to the false prophets.

verses.name: Luke 6:27
verses.text: But I say unto you which hear, Love your enemies, do good to them which hate you,

verses.name: Luke 6:28
verses.text: Bless them that curse you, and pray for them which despitefully use you.

verses.name: Luke 6:29
verses.text: And unto him that smiteth thee on the one cheek offer also the other; and him that taketh away thy cloke forbid not to take thy coat also.

verses.name: Luke 6:30
verses.text: Give to every man that asketh of thee; and of him that taketh away thy goods ask them not again.
